locations.name: Adventure Playground
locations.parentQuote: My kids adored that place and despite my worries, never got injured
locations.insiderTips: Called 'Tetanus Park' by locals. Kids can hammer, saw, paint for hours

locations.name: CuriOdyssey
locations.address: 401 El Camino Real, San Mateo, CA
locations.parentQuote: perfect for this age. Kids can run around and don't have to worry
locations.insiderTips: Combine with Magic Mountain Playground at Coyote Point

locations.name: Tilden Little Farm
locations.parentQuote: sweet and fun for Littles to bigger Littles
locations.insiderTips: Recently banned feeding. Very small - 30min walkthrough

locations.name: Happy Hollow
locations.parentQuote: literal favorite place as a kid. mysterious broke down attractions

locations.name: Lawrence Hall of Science
locations.insiderTips: Current special: dinosaur exhibit in courtyard

locations.name: Hayward Japanese Gardens
locations.parentQuote: for a quick stroll and seeing the fish and turtles in the pond
locations.insiderTips: Quick visit, perfect for short attention spans

locations.name: Children's Discovery Museum
locations.parentQuote: just as fantastic a visit, somewhat under-appreciated

locations.name: Presidio Tunnel Tops
locations.parentQuote: absolutely incredibly designed spaces for kids, and they are free!
